User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /install
Disallow: /share/

# 允许搜索引擎访问公共分享页面
Allow: /share/*/view

# 站点地图
Sitemap: /sitemap.xml

# 爬取延迟
Crawl-delay: 1

# 特定搜索引擎规则
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Crawl-delay: 0

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Baiduspider
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Crawl-delay: 2
